price: Ariko nibahagarika (kubarwanya), mu by’ukuri (bamenye ko) Allah ari Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe (azabababarira).
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
